00017 AccountTable::AccountTable(QWidget *parent, const char *name)
00018     : QTable(parent,name)  
00019 {
00020     db = Database::instance();
00021     settings = Settings::instance();
00022 
00023     setLeftMargin(0);
00024     setVScrollBarMode(QScrollView::AlwaysOn);
00025     setSelectionMode(QTable::SingleRow);
00026     setFocusStyle(QTable::SpreadSheet);
00027

00033

00051 void AccountTable::populate()
00052 {
00053     int rows = numRows();
00054     for(int row = 0; row < rows; row++)
00055         removeRow(0);
00056     
00057     QPtrList<QStringList>* data = db->getAccountsData();
00058     QPtrListIterator<QStringList> it(*data);
00059     
00060     QStringList *stringList;
00061     while((stringList = it.current()) != 0)
00062     {
00063         ++it;
00064         insertRows(0);
00065         setItem(0, 0, new AccountEditItem(this, stringList->operator[](1), stringList->operator[](0)));
00066         setItem(0, 1, new QTableItem(this, QTableItem::OnTyping, stringList->operator[](2)));
00067         delete stringList;
00068     }
00069 
00070     delete data;
00071 
00072     setColumnReadOnly(0, true);
00073     
00074     sortColumn(0, true, true);
00075 
00076     editingRow = 0;
00077     editingCol = 1;
00078 }
00079 
00080 void AccountTable::insert()
00081 {
00082     inserting = true;
00083 
00084     int newRow = numRows();
00085     insertRows(newRow);
00086 
00087     editing = true;
00088     editingRow = newRow;
00089     editingCol = 0;
00090 
00091     ensureCellVisible(newRow, 0);
00092     setItem(newRow, 0, new AccountEditItem(this, "", db->nextAccountKey()));
00093     setColumnReadOnly(0, false);
00094     setItem(newRow, 1, new QTableItem(this, QTableItem::OnTyping, ""));
00095     setCurrentCell(newRow,0);
00096 
00097     beginEdit(newRow, 0, false);
00098 }

00100 void AccountTable::remove(int row)
00101 {
00102     QString key = ((AccountEditItem*)(item(row, 0)))->getKey();
00103 
00104     if(db->accountHasEntries(text(row, 0)))
00105     {
00106         QDialog dialog;
00107         dialog.setCaption("Delete Record");
00108 
00109         QVBoxLayout vBoxLayout(&dialog);
00110         vBoxLayout.setMargin(5);
00111         vBoxLayout.setSpacing(5);
00112 
00113         QLabel label("<nobr>Cannot delete account " + text(row, 0) + "</nobr>;<br>"
00114                 "<nobr>there is data associated with this account.</nobr>", &dialog);
00115         
00116         vBoxLayout.addWidget(&label);
00117 
00118         vBoxLayout.addSpacing(10);
00119 
00120         QHBoxLayout hBoxLayout(&vBoxLayout);
00121         hBoxLayout.setSpacing(5);
00122 
00123         QPushButton okButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/okButton.png")),
00124                              "OK", &dialog);
00125         connect(&okButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(accept()));
00126

00140     vBoxLayout.setSpacing(5);

00151     QPushButton buttonDelete(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/deleteButton.png")),
00152                              "Delete", &dialog);
00153     connect(&buttonDelete, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(accept()));
00154 
00155     QPushButton buttonDontDelete(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/okButton.png")),
00156                                  "Don't Delete", &dialog);
00157     connect(&buttonDontDelete, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(reject()));
00158 
00159     buttonDontDelete.setDefault(true);
00160 
00161     hBoxLayout.addStretch();
00162     hBoxLayout.addWidget(&buttonDelete);
00163     hBoxLayout.addWidget(&buttonDontDelete);
00164 
00165     if(dialog.exec())
00166     {
00167         db->deleteAccount(key);
00168         removeRow(row);
00169 
00170         if(row > 0)
00171             setCurrentCell(row - 1, 1);
00172     }
00173 }

00175 void AccountTable::updateDb(int row, int)
00176 {
00177     QString id = text(row, 0);
00178     QString key = ((AccountEditItem*)(item(row, 0)))->getKey();
00179     QString desc = text(row, 1);
00180     db->updateAccount(key, id, desc);
00181 
00182     setColumnReadOnly(0, true);
00183     setCurrentCell(row, 1);
00184 }

00192 void AccountTable::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *event)
00193 {
00194     switch(event->key())
00195     {
00196         case Key_Insert:
00197             insert();
00198             break;
00199         case Key_Delete:
00200             remove(currentRow());
00201             break;
00202         case Key_Enter:
00203         case Key_Return:
00204         case Key_Tab:
00205             if(editing)
00206             {
00207                 if(inserting)
00208                 {
00209                     if(editingCol == 1)
00210                     {
00211                         endEdit(editingRow, editingCol, true, true);
00212                         editing = false;
00213                         inserting = false;
00214                         break;
00215                     }
00216 
00217                     endEdit(editingRow, editingCol, true, true);
00218                     sortColumn(0, true, true);
00219 
00220                     editingRow = currentRow();
00221                 }
00222                 else if(editingRow != (numRows() - 1))
00223                 {
00224                     endEdit(editingRow, editingCol, true, true);
00225                     editingRow++;
00226                 }
00227                 else
00228                 {
00229                     endEdit(editingRow, editingCol, true, true);
00230                     editing = false;
00231                     break;
00232                 }
00233             }
00234             editing = true;
00235             editingCol = 1;
00236 
00237             setCurrentCell(editingRow, editingCol);
00238             beginEdit(editingRow, editingCol, false);
00239             break;
00240         case Key_Escape:
00241             if(editing)
00242             {
00243                 endEdit(editingRow, editingCol, true, true);
00244                 editing = false;
00245                 inserting = false;
00246             }
00247             else
00248                 emit goToMain();
00249             break;
00250         case Key_Up:
00251         case Key_Left:
00252         case Key_Down:
00253         case Key_Right:
00254             if(inserting)
00255                 sortColumn(0, true, true);
00256             inserting = false;
00257 
00258             QTable::keyPressEvent(event);
00259             break;
00260         case Key_F1:
00261             emit goToMain();
00262             break;
00263         case Key_F2:
00264             break;
00265         case Key_F3:
00266             emit goToJournal();
00267             break;
00268         case Key_F4:
00269             emit goToReports();
00270             break;
00271         case Key_F5:
00272             emit goToHelp();
00273             break;
00274         default:
00275             QTable::keyPressEvent(event);
00276     }
00277 }
